 Now, let $x\in V$. Then $K_{\alpha+1}\cap\phi\sp\leftarrow(x)\subset W$ so $f_\alpha\sp\ast[K_{\alpha+1}\cap\phi\sp\leftarrow(x)]\subset f_\alpha\sp\ast[W]\subset \omega\sp\ast\setminus K_{\alpha+1}$. This completes the proof of condition (d) so we have finished the proof of the Theorem.
